title: Part-Time Job Opportunities for International Students in Iran
introduction: Many international students seek part-time job opportunities alongside their studies to gain work experience, manage living expenses, and integrate into the Iranian work environment. We provide assistance in finding legal and suitable part-time jobs that match students' skills and availability, ensuring they can balance work and academic commitments effectively.

benefits.title: Benefits of Part-Time Jobs for Students
benefits.point1-desc: Apply academic knowledge in real-world settings.
benefits.point2-desc: Help cover living expenses and reduce financial pressure.
benefits.point3-title: Familiarity with the Iranian Work Culture

jobTypes.title: Types of Part-Time Jobs Available
jobTypes.type1-desc: Teaching English, Arabic, or other languages.
jobTypes.type2-desc: Administrative, marketing, and content creation roles.
jobTypes.type4-desc: Assisting in research, translation, and editing.
jobTypes.type5-desc: Graphic design, programming, and content writing.

howToApply.title: How to Apply for a Part-Time Job?
howToApply.step1-desc: We evaluate your skills and match you with suitable job opportunities.
howToApply.step2-desc: If selected, we arrange interviews with potential employers.
howToApply.step3-desc: Some jobs require work permits, and we assist in obtaining them when needed.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Our Job Assistance Services?
whyUs.point1-desc: Ensuring legal and fair job opportunities.
whyUs.point2-desc: Jobs that fit your academic schedule.
whyUs.point3-desc: Helping students choose the right job based on their skills.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can international students work in Iran?
faq.a1: Yes, but certain jobs may require a work permit. We provide guidance on legal employment options.
faq.q2: How much do part-time jobs pay?
faq.a2: Salaries vary depending on the job type, hours worked, and student skills. Contact us for more details.
faq.q3: Do I need to know Persian to get a part-time job?
faq.a3: It depends on the job. Some roles, like English tutoring or working in international companies, do not require Persian proficiency.
faq.q4: How can I apply for a part-time job?
faq.a4: Fill out our job application form, and we will match you with suitable opportunities.

contact.title: Apply for a Part-Time Job Today!
contact.description: Looking for a job in Iran while studying? Contact us now to explore available job opportunities!
